title: Ra Programming Language
description: A simple interpreted dynamically-typed programming language.

title: Redis Clone
description: This project is a simplified clone of Redis, supporting basic commands and using the Redis Serialization Protocol (RESP) for communication and Data persistence using Append Only File (AOF).

title: Chat App
description: A fullstack real-time chat rooms app.

title: Movibes
description: Movibes is your ultimate destination for exploring a world of movies and TV shows. Dive into a cinematic adventure, where you can discover a wide range of films, watch trailers, explore cast and crew information, and much more.

title: FullStack URL Shortener
description: An URL shortener application created with Vuejs, Node.js, Express, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. The application allows users to shorten long URLs and track their click-through rates.

title: Football Fixtures API
description: Developed a RESTful API using Python, Flask, and Redis. The API allows users to fetch live, upcoming, and past Football fixtures.

title: Vending Machine API
description: A vending machine API built using Nodejs, TypeScript and sqlite3 with prisma ORM.

title: Minigrep
description: A basic grep clone created as a learning project for Rust.

title: FullStack Tasks Manager Website
description: A Full-Stack web application built with Ruby on Rails. The application allows users to create, update, and delete tasks, with user authentication.

title: Space Tourism
description: A Single Page Application (SPA) created with React and Tailwind CSS for exploring space tourism destinations. Enjoy an immersive and user-friendly experience as you navigate the cosmos.

title: URL Shortener CLI
description: Developed a CLI application for URL shortening using Python, The CLI application uses the URL Shortener API.

title: World Countries
description: World Countries Explorer is a simple web application that allows users to explore information about countries from all around the world. The application provides a user-friendly interface with several features for easy navigation and data retrieval.

title: Blogr Landing Page
description: Developed a responsive landing page with captivating animations using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The inclusion of responsive design ensures an optimal user experience across various devices.

title: Easybank Landing page
description: A responsive landing page built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The focus of this project is on delivering an elegant and user-friendly layout that adapts seamlessly to different screen sizes and devices.

title: Dual sense product page
description: An E-commerce product page built with React with responsive layout and animations

title: Sneakers product page
description: An E-commerce product page built with React with responsive layout

title: Hack Assembler
description: The Hack assembler is a simple and powerful tool that helps you to assemble your programs written in Hack Assembly language.
